Theme issues:

* Reduce excess whitespace. It's everywhere - between posts, around post content, to the left of posts, in the main forum view. All it does is make scanning the page more awkward and mess up mobile devices.
* Perhaps moved "posted xxx hours/days ago" off to the side to use some space up there, which will shuffle posts together more vertically. Additionally reducing the size of the Quote function area ( or moving that to the side too ) would do the same.
* Condense display fonts to roughly equal sizes so browser zoom keeps them all equivalent.
* Colour scheme with less white - if anyone's one of the people really suffering from the current scheme, please go look up Scotopic Sensitivity Syndrome & check if you have it. I'm aware that there are browser addons ( and css editing ) to adjust matters, but any change to the board will mean redoing all of that, every time.

Usability:

* Please make enter give single carriage return ( I'm trying to use single returns right now! ). This may not be how a word processor works, but it is how just about every other editor does.
* Toggle for Wizzywig / visible code editor.
* Toggle off Avatars ( I've done so using an ad blocker, but that would only last until a theme change ).
* Turn off auto-images in signatures, and especially autofollowing youtube links. Perhaps cap the size of signatures. i have disabled signatures as they end up another giant block between post content.
* Flickr compatible BBCode parsing for image blocks. ( edit: actually this still works, at least now it works. You have to actually post to make sure it's in correctly because there's no preview button! the edit box won't auto-parse pasted bbcode chunks ).

So far I'm liking the new forum, however the Activity session is severely lacking in relation to what it previously was:

  • No quick way to see activities on people/topics you follow. You have to create a feed for it yourself (or edit a default one and leave the title obsolete), and it doesn't show in the main menu (before, there were both links to "all unread content" and "following" right in the main menu on each page)
  • No way to mark a feed as read; you either click through all content, or mark the whole forum as read
  • No link to the latest post, or preferrably, to the earliest unread post. You have to open the topic and click "last page" from there As previous post explained, there is a link, but it's fairly hidden. Could make it more obvious, or the title link default to last page, too?
  • Bloat of 'default' activity streams which can't be deleted: Threads I Follow and People I Follow, for instance. I can edit these to suit my needs, but can't rename them. Update: I cannot actually edit them, any changes are lost when you click "Update Results"

That's from the top of my mind, there could be more but these are my bigest peeves.

like I said, tho, overall I'm satisfied with the new forum. If these are fixable I'll be very happy.

Cheers.
